title: Gekkan Mousou Kagaku
synopsis:
Gekkan Mousou Kagaku is set in Most City in an unknown country in a small publishing house that prints a monthly magazine about the most outlandish of things. Everything changes when the staff of the magazine, editor-in-chief Tarou, his assistant Jirou and dog Saburou, meet with scientist Gorou Satou...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

episodes.nome: Issue 1: More than Shocking! Taro's Transformation!
Issue 2: Hold on a Moment, Why Are You Working Here?!
Issue 3: More than Just Singing?! Musical Speak?!
Issue 4: Monstrous Mystery?! The Secret of Loch Nuss
Issue 5: What're You Moping About?! The Ice Prince
There's Whole Mobs of Them?! This Is Where the Cats Gather
The Moment Is Here! A Matchmaking Party
Body Moving! Walk One Dog and More Will Follow
Mystery Moments! The Young Genius' Past
Holy Moly! Fight and a Continental Rising!
Move Out! Catherine, Why Didn't You Warn Us?!
